value.name: Hanford police say beware of bogus bills
value.description: Fresno police uncovered $3,200.00 in counterfeit money. All in the form of $100.00 bills after making a traffic stop on Pleasant and Shields in Central Fresno. The driver, Samuel Torres of Reedley ...

value.name: THURSDAY SCHOLASTICS: Maloney volleyball goes out swinging; Blue Knights bumped in CCC quarters; 30-Something the show for Cheshire girls golf
value.description: Devin Juan chalked up a triple-double: 12 kills, 12 digs and 10 aces. Samuel Torres threw down a team-high 17 kills and served up three aces. Sathipat Chanthinith made his presence known at the ...

value.name: WEDNESDAY SCHOLASTICS: Party like its 1989! Maloney girls tennis takes first division title in 32 years
value.description: Devin Juan racked up 10 kills and eight digs for Maloney. Samuel Torres was good for five kills and six digs. The Spartans (3-14) were coming off a 25-10, 25-12, 25-19 sweep on Tuesday of Bulkeley ...

value.name: Lakeview's Watkins wins top honor at All-City meet 20 years after her mom did
value.description: Before the final awards presentation, Audrey Graham found herself in the midfield looking at the Most Outstanding Performer plaque for the All-City Girls Track Meet. She was looking for her name.
